function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Lax adherence to safety protocols leading to surge in covid-19 cases","Slow vaccine rollout leading to low vaccination rate","Ineffective data integration and sharing","Ineffective contact tracing systems","Lack of technological infrastructure for effective test and trace applications","Use of iot and related technologies in healthcare sector","Confinement measures and tracking of covid-19 patients using gps and other tools","Use of wearable devices and self-reported symptoms for covid-19 detection","Reliance on ai-based diagnosis for contagious diseases may lead to algorithmic biases and inaccurate identification","Privacy concerns and data security risks associated with the collection and transmission of sensitive health data from wearables to cloud systems","Increased reliance on remote work and telehealth leads to higher risk of contagious disease propagation through increased interaction in the built environment.","Increased reliance on technology for essential social interactions may lead to decreased in-person social connections, which can impact mental health and well-being.","Shift towards technology-driven future may lead to increased cyber security risks and vulnerabilities, especially with the collection and sharing of personal and sensitive data for remote transactions and interactions.","Lack of effective ai-based approaches for eradicating pandemics","Financial stress impacting technology adoption in the short-term","Lack of user cooperation in contact tracing","Privacy and security risks in iot data sharing","Barriers in adopting iot-based healthcare","Exposure to covid-19 through iot devices and technologies","Lack of data security in iot devices used for covid-19 management","Reliance on iot technology for disease management and control","Focus on iot in different sectors impacted by covid-19 may overlook specific health risk mitigation strategies.","Slow adoption of iot technology","Impact of covid-19 on digital transformation","Inadequate wastewater management leading to virus propagation","Propagation of viruses through touch surfaces and shared spaces","Potential spread of pathogens through air and water systems","Spread of pathogens through wastewater and waste management","Potential spread of viruses due to surface contact in the building","Inadequate access to outdoor spaces and greenery","Unsafe drinking water and wastewater management","Potential spread of contagious diseases in built environments due to lack of sustainable practices and certifications","Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","Rise in importance of residential sustainability due to predicted increase in zoonotic diseases","Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","Lack of coordination in urban policy and planning to address new behaviors and needs arising from the covid-19 pandemic","Contagious diseases spread through outdoor activities and social interactions in urban parks during the pandemic.","Increased risk of disease transmission in built environments due to lack of sustainable practices and certifications","Inadequate consideration of residential buildings as multifunctional spaces during pandemics and post-pandemics","Rise in importance of residential sustainability due to predicted increase in zoonotic diseases","Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","Lack of coordination in urban policy and planning to address new behaviors and needs arising from the covid-19 pandemic","Contagious diseases spread through outdoor activities and social interactions in urban parks during the pandemic.","Higher education and knowledge in urban planning may lead to overconfidence in understanding disease transmission dynamics in u urban public parks.","Increased demand for urban green spaces may lead to overcrowding and insufficient social distancing measures in parks.","Ugs serving as centers of public gathering can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Increased importance of green spaces and ugs as places of refuge during the pandemic may lead to overcrowding and congestion in these areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Dependence on ugs for respite and isolation can lead to non-compliance with public health guidelines and riskier behavior in these areas.","Reduced visitation to parks and urban green spaces due to legal restrictions on access","Dichotomy in access to green spaces resulting in localized or long-distance travel","Reduction in use of private cars and increase in pedestrian traffic for reaching green spaces","Reduced accessibility to ugs due to pandemic restrictions","Transmission risks in densely built urban areas","Impact on mental health and well-being due to reduced access to ugs","Lack of emphasis on hygiene and sanitation in urban planning and management","Limited education and awareness about public health and environmental hygiene","Inadequate access to green space and nature resulting in poor mental and physical health","Potential spread of viruses due to surface contact in the building","Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in building design and optimization","Potential for contagion in close spatial arrangements","Transmission of diseases in industrial applications","Contagious diseases transmission due to crowded physical spaces","Impact of spatial layout on disease transmission","Risky proximity leading to contagious disease spread in indoor environments","Risky spatial layout leading to close proximity and increased risk of disease spread","Inefficient airflow patterns leading to disease transmission","Insufficient lighting creating discomfort and health risks"],"non-risks":["Permanent work from home policies and relocation due to work from home options may lead to changes in population distribution and density, impacting the spread of contagious diseases in different geographical areas.","Acceleration of adoption of telehealth and home care","Use of handheld and portable ultrasound solutions for covid-19 patients","Integration of covid-19 identification systems into wearables may lead to a false sense of security and reduced adherence to other preventive measures","Increased demand for wearables due to covid-19","Acceleration of iot adoption in healthcare sector due to covid-19","Increased use of wearable devices for tracking and contact tracing during covid-19","Potential spread of covid-19 due to extensive interviewing and interaction with people from various companies and organizations","Potential exposure to covid-19 during extensive literature review and database searching","Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","Reduced accessibility to ugs due to pandemic restrictions","Impact of temperature and humidity on virus survival and transmission.","Challenges in communication and social interaction due to physical distancing measures.","Inadequate consideration of human behavior and social dynamics in the designed physical spaces, leading to non-compliance with social distancing measures.","Dependence on computational tools for disease tracking and analysis","Lack of computational solutions for social distancing enhanced optimal design of physical spaces"]}
